definitions: the quality of being relatively small in height or length

examples.text: because of my shortness I had to crane my head to see
the unnatural shortness of the bed

shortDefinitions: quality of measuring small distance from end to end

definitions: the quality of lasting a small amount of time
shortDefinitions: quality of lasting small amount of time

definitions: the quality of being relatively small in extent

examples.text: I apologize for the shortness of this letter
his speech was excellent because of its shortness

shortDefinitions: quality of being relatively small in extent

definitions: the state of not having enough of something; lack

examples.text: the school had to close due to shortness of staff
because of the shortness of time, question 4 remained unanswered
she suffers from shortness of breath

shortDefinitions: state of not having enough of something

definitions: the quality of being abrupt or rude in speech

examples.text: my shortness with people contributed to my demise

shortDefinitions: quality of being abrupt or rude
